  • CSS Summit
    Michael Walker ● May 1, 2016

    CSS Summit brings together some of the web’s most notable experts for an all-new, three-day online conference. This year’s event includes a live CSS and Sass conference, as well as an SVG, Sass and advanced CSS track.

    Andrew Chalkley ● May 1, 2016

    Converges assembles some of the best speakers in the industry to inform and inspire you! It’s for the love of the web and the love of our community. This year’s event includes a full schedule of keynotes, sessions and workshops.
